main event: An unexplained aerial light was observed at Camp Wolters, Texas on 8 July 1961.
interesting points: The light was first observed by Warrant Officer O. B. F. and was stationary in the northern sky for about 15 minutes., Warrant Officer F. and Captain H. also confirmed seeing the light for approximately 10 minutes., Lieutenant G. and several enlisted personnel observed the same light for about 15 minutes., The light was the size of a baseball held at arm's length and bright white in color., No radar contact or aircraft were noted during the sighting.
witness description: Warrant Officer O. B. F., Warrant Officer F., Captain H., Lieutenant G., and several enlisted personnel
